column4: OK, would everyone stop posting Stupid Command Line Tricks, thanks?
command line commands are the easiest way to give support, as you simply have to copy and paste commands.  It is far more consistent that using a gui to give support
that wasn't what I was telling people to stop. I was commenting on some of the "CPU locking" and filesystem wrecking.. stuff.
well, forgive me, I didn't read all of my scrollback
